title: Dog Soldier
synopsis: When an American scientist carrying a cure for the AIDS virus is kidnapped by an arms merchant, John Kyosuke is forced back from retirement. He accepts the challenge to regain possession of the anti-serum. He finds out that some of the people he is after are closely related, which gives his conquest a whole new meaning.
characters: ['Hiba, John Kyosuke', 'Takamura, Makoto Allen', 'Magley, Catherine', 'Takechi', 'Fudou, Masami']
